member.name: M:CSF.Screenplay.Selenium.Actions.ISingleElementPerformable
member.para: This class is not a complete action, as it relies upon shared logic to retrieve the upon which it shall act. It has this in common with most of the Screenplay actions in the Selenium Plugin which operate upon a single element (those which derive from ). In order for an instance of this class to be used as a full , the instance must be wrapped within an instance of . Note that the builder method(s) mentioned above take care of this, so normal usage does not need to deal with this factor.
